structure.unit: RELIGIOUS, CHARITABLE, AND EDUCATIONAL SOCIETIES -- NONSTOCK, NONPROFIT CORPORATIONS

law.catch_line: Registered office and registered agent of foreign corporation.
law.text: Each foreign corporation authorized to transact business in this state shall continuously maintain in this state a registered office and a registered agent that satisfy the requirements of KRS 14A.4-010.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 151, sec. 67, effective January 1, 2011. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 341, sec. 16, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 236, effective January 1, 1989.
